verses.verse: Therefore you shall love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> his charge <S%H4931><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, always <S%H3117><s%>.

And know <S%H3045><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>: for I speak not with your sons <S%H1121><s%> which have not known <S%H3045><s%>, and which have not seen <S%H7200><s%> the chastisement <S%H4148><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, his greatness <S%H1433><s%>, his mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and his stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>,

And his miracles <S%H226><s%>, and his acts <S%H4639><s%>, which he did <S%H6213><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and unto all his land <S%H776><s%>;

And what he did <S%H6213><s%> unto the army <S%H2428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, unto their horses <S%H5483><s%>, and to their chariots <S%H7393><s%>; how he made the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> to overflow <S%H6687><s%> them <S%H6440><s%> as they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, and how the Lord has destroyed <S%H6><s%> them unto this day <S%H3117><s%>;
And what he did <S%H6213><s%> unto you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, until you came <S%H935><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%>;

And what he did <S%H6213><s%> unto Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>: how the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6475><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%>, and their households <S%H1004><s%>, and their tents <S%H168><s%>, and all the substance <S%H3351><s%> that was in their possession <S%H7272><s%>, in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>:
But your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> acts <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which he did <S%H6213><s%>.

Therefore shall you keep <S%H8104><s%> all the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, that you may be strong <S%H2388><s%>, and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, where you go <S%H5674><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>;

And that you may prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them and to their seed <S%H2233><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

For the land <S%H776><s%>, where you go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H776><s%>, is not as the land of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from from where you came out <S%H3318><s%>, where you sowed <S%H2232><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%>, and watered <S%H8248><s%> it with your foot <S%H7272><s%>, as a garden <S%H1588><s%> of herbs <S%H3419><s%>:

But the land <S%H776><s%>, where you go <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H776><s%>, is a land of hills <S%H2022><s%> and valleys <S%H1237><s%>, and drinks <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of the rain <S%H4306><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>:

A land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> cares for <S%H1875><s%>: the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> are always <S%H8548><s%> upon it <S%H7225><s%>, from the beginning of the year <S%H8141><s%> even unto the end <S%H319><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, if you shall listen diligently <S%H8085><s%> unto my commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>,

That I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> in his due season <S%H6256><s%>, the first rain <S%H3138><s%> and the latter rain <S%H4456><s%>, that you may gather <S%H622><s%> in your corn <S%H1715><s%>, and your wine <S%H8492><s%>, and your oil <S%H3323><s%>.
And I will send <S%H5414><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> in your fields <S%H7704><s%> for your cattle <S%H929><s%>, that you may eat <S%H398><s%> and be full <S%H7646><s%>.

Take care <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves <S%H3824><s%>, that your heart be not deceived <S%H6601><s%>, and you turn aside <S%H5493><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and worship them <S%H7812><s%>;

And then the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s wrath <S%H639><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you <S%H6113><s%>, and he shut up the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, that there be no rain <S%H4306><s%>, and that the land <S%H127><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> not her fruit <S%H2981><s%>; and lest you perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gives you <S%H5414><s%>.

Therefore shall you lay up <S%H7760><s%> these my words <S%H1697><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%> and in your soul <S%H5315><s%>, and bind <S%H7194><s%> them for a sign <S%H226><s%> upon your hand <S%H3027><s%>, that they may be as frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between your eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And you shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them your sons <S%H1121><s%>, speaking <S%H1696><s%> of them when you sit <S%H3427><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%>, and when you walk <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, when you lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H6965><s%>, and when you rise up.
And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> them upon the door posts <S%H4201><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%>, and upon your gates <S%H8179><s%>:

That your days <S%H3117><s%> may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%>, and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H3117><s%>, as the days of heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For if you shall diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> all these commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, to do them <S%H157><s%>, to love the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to cleave unto him <S%H1692><s%>;

Then will the Lord <S%H3068><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> all these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and you shall possess greater <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and mightier than yourselves <S%H6099><s%>.

Every place <S%H4725><s%> whereon the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> shall be yours <S%H4057><s%>: from the wilderness and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, from the river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>, even unto the outermost <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> shall your coast be <S%H1366><s%>.

There shall no man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>: for the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> shall lay <S%H5414><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of you and the dread <S%H4172><s%> of you upon <S%H6440><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> that you shall tread <S%H1869><s%> upon <S%H1696><s%>, as he has said unto you.
Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> and a curse <S%H7045><s%>;
A blessing <S%H1293><s%>, if you obey <S%H8085><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>:

And a curse <S%H7045><s%>, if you will not obey <S%H8085><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, but turn aside <S%H5493><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, which you have not known <S%H3045><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3068><s%>, when the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> has brought you in <S%H935><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> where you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H5414><s%>, that you shall put the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%>, and the curse <S%H7045><s%> upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%>.

Are they not on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, by <S%H310><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> where the sun <S%H8121><s%> goes down <S%H3996><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, which live <S%H3427><s%> in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, beside <S%H681><s%> the plains <S%H436><s%> of Moreh <S%H4176><s%>?

For you shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and you shall possess it <S%H3427><s%>, and live in it.
And you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> which I set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%>.
